items.definition_en: A rose is a plant with beautiful flowers and thorns.
items.example_en: She planted a rose in her garden last spring.

items.definition_en: A tree is a tall plant with a trunk and branches.
items.example_en: There is a big tree in the middle of the garden.

items.definition_en: A flower is the colorful part of a plant.
items.example_en: Every spring many flowers bloom in the garden.

items.definition_en: A bush is a small plant with many branches close to the ground.
items.example_en: We planted a bush next to the fence.

items.definition_en: Grass is a green plant that covers the ground.
items.example_en: The grass in the garden is soft and green.

items.definition_en: A herb is a small plant that people use for food or medicine.
items.example_en: She grows basil and other herbs in her garden.

items.definition_en: A leaf is a flat green part of a plant.
items.example_en: A yellow leaf fell from the tree onto the grass.

items.definition_en: A shrub is a woody plant smaller than a tree.
items.example_en: They have a pretty shrub near the garden gate.

items.definition_en: A vine is a plant with long stems that climb or spread.
items.example_en: Vines grow quickly along the garden fence.

items.definition_en: A seed is a small object from which a new plant can grow.
items.example_en: He planted a seed in a small pot.

items.definition_en: A root is the part of a plant that grows underground.
items.example_en: The root of the plant takes water from the soil.

items.definition_en: A stem is the long part of a plant that supports leaves and flowers.
items.example_en: The stem of the flower is very strong.

items.definition_en: A bulb is a round part underground that grows into a plant.
items.example_en: You should plant tulip bulbs in autumn.

items.definition_en: A cactus is a plant with thick stems and sharp spines.
items.example_en: He keeps a small cactus in a pot on the porch.

items.definition_en: A daisy is a small white and yellow flower.
items.example_en: Daisies grow all over the garden in summer.

items.definition_en: A lily is a large flower that has a pleasant smell.
items.example_en: The white lilies bloom in July.

items.definition_en: A sunflower is a tall plant with a big yellow flower.
items.example_en: The sunflower follows the sun during the day.

items.definition_en: A fern is a green plant with many small leaves.
items.example_en: Ferns grow well in the shady part of the garden.

items.definition_en: Ivy is a green plant that climbs walls and fences.
items.example_en: Ivy covers the back wall of their garden.

items.definition_en: A hedge is a line of bushes planted close together.
items.example_en: They trimmed the hedge around the garden every month.
